Name: Caterline
description:
Caterline (a 47-year-old mom of 6 pictured in her tea crop farm) has surprised many people in Kenyenya with her intense goodness. She is a proud mum of cute children, whom she really adores and cherishes. She is an active woman who works in agriculture, a skill that she inherited from her parents. Also, she engages in some small business activities,

Caterline has been a very hardworking mixed farmer for many years, growing tea and keeping dairy cows. Through these activities, she has been able to earn a decent and honest income.

Although Caterline has been making profits through farming, not everything has been easy for this humble and industrious mother. Her farm has not been producing as much of a harvest lately due to a lack of fertilizer. That is why she is seeking a loan to buy farm inputs such as nutrient-rich fertilizers to improve her tea crop farm. Through this loan, Caterline will be assured a bumper tea crop harvest, which will mean more profits and income. Using this loan, she will be able to expand her enterprise.

Caterline hopes you will consider her appeal for the loan. It would mean a lot to her and her family. Brighten up spirits this year season by granting her a loan!
